description: Redevelopment to provide 20710 sq.m.  of B1 floorspace, and 615 sq.m. of A1/A2/A3 floorspace within a building of between 8 and 19 storeys.
decision_conditions: This council considers the height of the development to be excessive and due to its impact it  will erode the setting of Finsbury Square and the character and appearance if the Finsbury Square and Bunhill Fields  Conservation Area. The London Borough of Islington objects to the proposed development.
